hackathon-description-text: Cipher presents: Local Hack Day, a 12-hour mini-hackathon on December 3rd, 2016.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Syma X5C 2.4G 6 Axis GYRO HD Camera RC Quadcopter with 2.0MP Camera
Pusheen plushies — a chubby gray tabby cat that loves cuddles, snacks, and dress-up

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2 Wellington St E, Brampton, ON L6W 1Y2, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: - How well the demo has been developed, did you think about all aspects of it?

- How feasible is your project
- Will your project work in the real world
- How aesthetically pleasing the project is
-Was your hack hard to make, was it complex?
-How unique is your idea, has it already been executed?
-How funny was your idea? We like memes.

hackathon-location-address: 2 Wellington St E, Brampton, ON L6W 1Y2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Local Hack Day - facilitating an environment for beginner & experienced coders alike
